nodes.text: The Hole was an establishment in a seedy part of the Coruscant underworld, situated next to Enmonst Rclub. An Aurebesh neon sign spelled out the name. During the Clone Wars, bounty hunter Cad Bane stayed in an apartment near The Hole, while planning the Mission to the Jedi Temple.

During pre-production, the establishment that became The Hole was known as "Bigrock", as seen in concept art of the Coruscant underworld. In the concept art, an Aurebesh sign over the name of the establishment says "lal".
